trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A mód, amely kezeli a **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** az esemény egy <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: A FormsAuthenticationEventHandler delegált van definiálva a következő <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>osztály</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> az esemény</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Érheti el a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>az esemény a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>nevű eljárást megadásával osztály **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** az ASP.NET-alkalmazás a Global.asax fájlban.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>hoz létre egy <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>az aktuális objektum <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, és továbbadja azt a **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** esemény.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Használhatja a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>átadott objektum a **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** esemény beállítása a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>tulajdonságát az aktuális <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>az egy egyéni <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektum.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Ha nem ad meg értéket a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>tulajdonság során a **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** esemény, a az űrlapos hitelesítési jegyet a cookie-k vagy URL-cím által megadott identitás szolgál.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: A **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** esemény csak akkor jelenik meg, ha a hitelesítési <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>értékre van állítva <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>és a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>van egy aktív HTTP-modulja az alkalmazáshoz.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
